price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߓߌ߬ ߛߊ߫߸ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߍߣߍ߲߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߦߟߍߓߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
